name: Resend TwoFactorAuthentication OTP
description: This API is used to resend the twofactorauthentication otp to logging-in via SmsAuthenticator

Get Params.name: secondfactorauthenticationtoken
Get Params.description: SecondFactorAuthenticationToken from the response of 2FA authentication API

Get Params.name: smstemplate2fa
Get Params.description: SMS Template Name (This template is used for 2FA OTP template)
